ing: 1 unsweetened cherry flavored drink mix powder
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "Easy, cool, and kids LOVE it! Any flavor drink mix can be used."
ins: In a medium bowl, combine drink mix powder and condensed milk. Mix until smooth and even in color. Fold in whipped topping. Pour mixture into graham cracker and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
